label: Genome content comparison between taxa
definition:
• This stanza is based on a pre-calculated MBGD ortholog clustering result (such as the default ortholog dataset).
  • The gene presence/absence pattern is examined for each ortholog group.
  • The listed genes in this stanza mostly exist in a specified taxon (>=80% of the evaluated organisms) while not in the other taxon (<=20% of the evaluated organisms).

parameter.description: Two taxonomy IDs separated by comma
Lower bound of existence ratio in taxonomy ID 1
Upper bound of existence ratio in taxonomy ID 2

author: Hiroyo NISHIDE
